comments:
build I20040225

Doing regular navigation around the code, I got the following.
I believe I had just opened an editor.  I was in the Java perspective with the 
Package Explorer open and with editor linking on.  I believe it was the one 
that had the problem, because after this it had no decorations.

After this, the package explorer and navigator were getting blank labels (not 
just missing decorations) for newly expanded items.
This is a bug in Team. However we should fail more gracefully - see Bug 41545.

We've seen this before and had thought that this was a plug-in loading problem.
Basically the NPe is because a static wansn't initialized. We will have to look
into this again :(

The problem that was fixed was in TeamUIPlugin. I have found another 
vulnerability in the CVSUIPlugin. The images are initialized in the startup 
method but there is no gaurentee that this will happen before other threads 
can access the plugin. We will need to initialize the images in the 
constructor.
